The ReadRobotMessages class - Creates and keeps information on the robot running the algorithm and its teammates. Is used as a middle-man between all robots. More...

Detailed Description

The ReadRobotMessages class - Creates and keeps information on the robot running the algorithm and its teammates. Is used as a middle-man between all robots.
